data.text:
It was another beautiful day. I was on my way to the trainer's 
office in a good mood when—
data.processed:
<story>It was another beautiful day. I was on my way to the trainer's 
<story>office in a good mood when—

data.text: Move it, move it, move it pleaaaseee!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Move it, move it, move it pleaaaseee!

data.text: (Dashdashdashdashdash!!)
data.processed: <story>(Dashdashdashdashdash!!)

data.text: (Zshhhhhh!)
data.processed: <story>(Zshhhhhh!)

data.text:
The horsegirl who had been running at a tremendous pace — Sakura 
Bakushin O — came to a stop right in front of me.
data.processed:
<story>The horsegirl who had been running at a tremendous pace — Sakura 
<story>Bakushin O — came to a stop right in front of me.

data.text:
Phew, emergency stop — success!! 
Swift decisions, immediate action, that's me!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Y-You gave me a moment there…

data.processed:
<story>Phew, emergency stop — success!! 
<story>Swift decisions, immediate action, that's me!

data.text: I'm very sorry, I was in a hurry!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I'm very sorry, I was in a hurry!

data.text:
But, this is Tracen Academy. The corridors are for running, the 
last three furlongs are before the gate! I suggest you pay 
attention from now on!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>But, this is Tracen Academy. The corridors are for running, the 
<story>last three furlongs are before the gate! I suggest you pay 
<story>attention from now on!

data.text:
Oops. I'd like to give you some more 
tips on life at the academy, but…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Oops. I'd like to give you some more 
<story>tips on life at the academy, but…

data.text:
I'm sure my classmates are waiting for 
me to show up, so I'll be off!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure my classmates are waiting for 
<story>me to show up, so I'll be off!!

data.text:
Trusty class president Sakura Bakushin O is 
on her way～! Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Trusty class president Sakura Bakushin O is 
<story>on her way～! Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!!

data.text:
As stupendously quickly as she had come, 
Sakura Bakushin O ran off again.
data.processed:
<story>As stupendously quickly as she had come, 
<story>Sakura Bakushin O ran off again.

data.text:
Her bewildering comments aside, I was very impressed with her 
acceleration and spirit…
data.processed:
<story>Her bewildering comments aside, I was very impressed with her 
<story>acceleration and spirit…

data.text: Youuu! Hold it right theeere!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Youuu! Hold it right theeere!

data.text:
As long as the class president blood runs in my veins — no, even 
if it stops — I won't allow you to skip on cleaning duty!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>As long as the class president blood runs in my veins — no, even 
<story>if it stops — I won't allow you to skip on cleaning duty!!

data.text:
Class president Daash!! 
Tooooooooooo!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Class president Daash!! 
<story>Tooooooooooo!!

data.text:
Your class president brings fortunate news! 
Goood neeews! Today's…!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Your class president brings fortunate news! 
<story>Goood neeews! Today's…!

data.text:
Today's cafeteria dessert is sakura mochi! 
You hear right, sakura mochi!! I simply adore sakura mochi!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Today's cafeteria dessert is sakura mochi! 
<story>You hear right, sakura mochi!! I simply adore sakura mochi!!!

data.text:
How could anyone resist running straight over to eat some! 
Come, come, follow me! Forwards! Bakushiiiiiin!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>How could anyone resist running straight over to eat some! 
<story>Come, come, follow me! Forwards! Bakushiiiiiin!

data.text:
It was far from the last time I saw her busily 
running around the academy that day. A little later—
data.processed:
<story>It was far from the last time I saw her busily 
<story>running around the academy that day. A little later—

data.text: (Knock knock! Slide!)
data.processed: <story>(Knock knock! Slide!)

data.text:
Excuse me! A pleasure to meet you! 
I'm Sakura Bakushin O, class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: It was "a pleasure to meet you" a while ago…
choices.processed: <size=36>It was "a pleasure to meet you" a while ago…</size>

choices.text: It was "a pleasure to meet you" earlier…
choices.processed: <size=41>It was "a pleasure to meet you" earlier…</size>

data.processed:
<story>Excuse me! A pleasure to meet you! 
<story>I'm Sakura Bakushin O, class president!

data.text: Huwhoa!? What now…!? You mean…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Huwhoa!? What now…!? You mean…

data.text:
You've already heard of and fallen in love with my beautiful 
and wonderful class president ways?!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>You've already heard of and fallen in love with my beautiful 
<story>and wonderful class president ways?!

data.text:
What's that? You think I've transcended class presidentism, 
and became more like class presigod?! You're making 
me blush! Tell me more!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>What's that? You think I've transcended class presidentism, 
<story>and became more like class presigod?! You're making 
<story>me blush! Tell me more!

data.text:
…I conveyed to this out of control girl that 
I was the trainer from this morning.
data.processed:
<story>…I conveyed to this out of control girl that 
<story>I was the trainer from this morning.

data.text: Now that you mention it, I've seen your face before!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Now that you mention it, I've seen your face before!?

data.text:
Well! You've cleared up my misunderstanding, and I've come 
to know who you are! We've both gained something!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Well! You've cleared up my misunderstanding, and I've come 
<story>to know who you are! We've both gained something!

data.text: So, I'll leave you to enjoy a wonderful day! So long!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>So, I'll leave you to enjoy a wonderful day! So long!

data.text: W A I T !!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>W A I T !!

data.text:
I, as the dependable class president, was asked 
by the teacher to deliver a document!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I, as the dependable class president, was asked 
<story>by the teacher to deliver a document!

data.text:
Sakura Bakushin O handed me a document. Skimming 
through, I found that it contained information on 
the Selection Race to be held this weekend.
data.processed:
<story>Sakura Bakushin O handed me a document. Skimming 
<story>through, I found that it contained information on 
<story>the Selection Race to be held this weekend.

data.text:
Incidentally, I noticed the name "Sakura 
Bakushin O" on the race entrants list…
data.processed:
<story>Incidentally, I noticed the name "Sakura 
<story>Bakushin O" on the race entrants list…

data.text:
Yessir! You're welcome! 
Leave it to my class president skills!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Yessir! You're welcome! 
<story>Leave it to my class president skills!

data.text:
Now then, next I need to… report to the teacher, change the 
water in the vases, put up the new class news poster, 
inspect the training course—
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: A busy day, it sounds like.
A busy day, it sounds like.

data.processed:
<story>Now then, next I need to… report to the teacher, change the 
<story>water in the vases, put up the new class news poster, 
<story>inspect the training course—

data.text:
Yessir, 'cause I'm the class president! 
To help out and be a good role model to everyone, 
I must put in the effort every day!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Yessir, 'cause I'm the class president! 
<story>To help out and be a good role model to everyone, 
<story>I must put in the effort every day!

data.text: As I have gloriously done from childhood.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>As I have gloriously done from childhood.

data.text:
With apples and oranges, they called me a "child prodigy". 
With sprinting, they called me a "speed prodigy"!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>With apples and oranges, they called me a "child prodigy". 
<story>With sprinting, they called me a "speed prodigy"!

data.text:
I was often told when my parents heard my first 
cries, they knew that they had "given birth to 
someone who would lead the world on the right path".
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I was often told when my parents heard my first 
<story>cries, they knew that they had "given birth to 
<story>someone who would lead the world on the right path".

data.text: And a turning point came when I was in first grade!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>And a turning point came when I was in first grade!!!!

data.text:
What do you think it was? I'll give you a hint: it starts with a 
"c", has an "pre" in the middle, and a "t" at the end!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>What do you think it was? I'll give you a hint: it starts with a 
<story>"c", has an "pre" in the middle, and a "t" at the end!

data.text: So!! I!! Was!!!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>So!! I!! Was!!!!

data.text:
Candidates were asked for. The class, shy and quiet… 
The clock could be heard ticking… And there I was, my full 
attention to the butterflies by the window…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Candidates were asked for. The class, shy and quiet… 
<story>The clock could be heard ticking… And there I was, my full 
<story>attention to the butterflies by the window…

data.text:
Eventually, the teacher turned to me — sitting in the 
front seat — and said…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Eventually, the teacher turned to me — sitting in the 
<story>front seat — and said…

data.text:
"Only a good girl can do this job, to be a role model for 
everyone. How about it?"
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>"Only a good girl can do this job, to be a role model for 
<story>everyone. How about it?"

data.text: That's the moment I knew for sure!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>That's the moment I knew for sure!!

data.text:
I am the class president!! 
And the class president is me!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I am the class president!! 
<story>And the class president is me!!

data.text:
Me, a child prodigy full of excellence and divine speed, 
born into this world to guide everyone down the right path 
as class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Me, a child prodigy full of excellence and divine speed, 
<story>born into this world to guide everyone down the right path 
<story>as class president!

data.text:
Oops, this chat has gone on too long! 
Now if you'll excuse me, I have to be off!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Oops, this chat has gone on too long! 
<story>Now if you'll excuse me, I have to be off!

data.text: Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Bakushin Bakushiiiiin!!

data.text:
And Sakura Bakushin O ran away at the same breakneck speed I'd 
witnessed that morning.
data.processed:
<story>And Sakura Bakushin O ran away at the same breakneck speed I'd 
<story>witnessed that morning.

data.text:
I'm not sure what she was on about, but I was kind of 
interested in the way she'd run in the Selection Race.
data.processed:
<story>I'm not sure what she was on about, but I was kind of 
<story>interested in the way she'd run in the Selection Race.

data.text: … Just kind of.
data.processed: <story>… Just kind of.
